name: Half Moon - Test
description:
PLAY IN FULL SCREEN! 

This is just a quick test of a narrative game I was hoping to make.

It's just to show some of my colleagues the general art direction/atmosphere and get some input.

Anyone is welcome to test it, of course.

Controls:

Mouse for the first layout, drag left and right and avoid obstacles.

WASD for second althought it's not much. 

NOTE: animations are really messy, I'm aware of that. I'll fix that later.
